amendatorysection.catchline: Service when sheriff is a party or is interested.
amendatorysection.para: An order for a provisional remedy or any other process, in an action wherein the sheriff is a party, or is interested, shall be directed to the coroner. If both these officers are interested, the process shall be directed to and executed by a person appointed by the court or judge.

annotation.para: Where sheriff is party, private person may be deputized to serve process. Mysenburg v. Leisure, 63 Neb. 239, 88 N.W. 478 (1901).
